name: Questrade API Python Wrapper
tagline: A Python wrapper for the Questrade Restful API
body:
### Welcome to PyQuestrade. PyQuestrade is a Python wrapper of the Questrade REST API.
[Questrade](http://www.questrade.com/) is a leading Canadian Discount Brokerage with the goal of allowing investors reach financial independence.
Python is a leading programming language with a rich set of packages to analyze financial data PyQuestrade aims to bridge the gap for developers so that they can create pythonic investing applications ### Authors and Contributors This project is currently being maintained by Peter Cinat (@pcinat).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
